name: Manic Machine
description:
Having recently gotten a job at a factory, you show up for your first day of work. However, things quickly spiral out of control when everything starts to break.

The game is about trying to keep up with a slew of things that are breaking as you try and fix them with progressively less time to do so.

This game was made for the Godot Wild Game Jam #37, which I'm both excited and nervous about! I don't know how much fun the game is, but I sure hope anybody who plays it does have fun with it! 

Since it's a jam game, it's unfinished in a few aspects, such as the menus, which have nothing done because I ran out of time. I don't know if I'll do any work on it now, even after the jam. I did love making it, though! And I learned a ton from it!
